page.title: 15DAY IN THE LIFE OF J.LLOYD
page.content: DAY IN THE LIFE OF MRS JENNIFER LLOYD The alarm clock woke me at 7 a.m., Tuesday 20th May 1985. I woke my son David, washed dressed and prepared breakfast. I put the washing into piles - whites, coloureds and towels. At 8 a.m. my daughter Emma comes down for breakfast and David leaves for school. I put coal on the fire to heat the water for washing. After Emma leaves for school I put the vacuum cleaner over the carpets and hang out the washing. My husband Clayton and I have coffee, then go shopping to Asda's Supermarket. On returning I prepare Toad-in-the-hole, a batter pudding with sausages which we'll eat with potatoes, cauliflower and carrots. After spending the evening at the sports centre, doing gymnastics with Emma, I feed the dog and go to bed. Tomorrow is another day.
